sortDisp(double) - Method in class gov.usgs.locator.Wresidual

sortEst() - Method in class gov.usgs.locator.Wresidual

sortEstDisp(double) - Method in class gov.usgs.locator.Wresidual

Set the sort value to sort by travel-time residual.
sortSpread(double) - Method in class gov.usgs.locator.Wresidual
Set the sort value to sort by absolute demedianed travel-time residuals in order to compute the spread, a 1-norm measure of scatter.
spread() - Method in class gov.usgs.locator.Restimator
Compute the normalized median absolute deviation or spread of the travel-time residuals (excluding the Bayesian depth residual).

stepLength(double[], double, double, double, double) - Method in class gov.usgs.locator.LinearStep
